https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/imcOp1kJsCsAFCoOtY5OnPrFbAf.jpg The lively João Grilo and the sly Chicó are poor guys living in the hinterland who cheat a bunch of people in a small in Northeastern Brazil. When they die, they have to be judged by Christ, the Devil and the Virgin Mary before they are admitted to paradise. A Dog's Will
